name: Alexa-Driven Boat License Renewal Automation
description: This pattern automates the renewal process of a boat license using Alexa as an interactive assistant. It first verifies with the user through a voice interaction if they still own a boat before proceeding with the renewal process. The solution integrates with external services through APIs if available, and uses voice interaction for user confirmations.
input_requirements: API access to license renewal service

required_integrations: Alexa should reprompt and if she can't do it then tell me

llm_recommended_approach: Implement an Alexa skill using Alexa Skills Kit with Amazon Lambda functions to handle interactions. Use a conditional flow to verify boat ownership and proceed to API-based process if confirmed. Ensure seamless voice interaction with graceful error handling. Use OAuth2 for secure API access.
